text: Squads for the Football at the 1974 Asian Games played in Tehran, Iran. ==Group A== ====== Head coach: Choi Young-geun ====== ====== Head coach: Seraniw Chinwala ==Group B== ====== ====== ====== Head coach: Thamir Muhsin ====== ==Group C== ====== Head coach: David Schweitzer ====== Head coach: Ken Naganuma ====== Head coach: Jalil Che Din ====== Head coach: Florentino Broce ==Group D== ====== ====== Head coach: Sein Hlaing ====== Head coach: Frank O'Farrell ====== ==References== ==External links== *https://web.archive.org/web/20140102232311/http://rdfc.com.ne.kr/int/skor- intres-1970.html *http://www.rsssf.com/tablesj/jap-intres1970.html *http://www.rsssf.com/tablesi/isra-intres70.html 1974 Squads
